titles.title: Supporting Market Access to Reinvigorate Trade Act of 2022
SMART Act
Supporting Market Access to Reinvigorate Trade Act of 2022

To amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to increase the funds allocated to carry out the market access program and the foreign market development cooperator program of the Department of Agriculture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Foreign Agriculture.

bill.summary:
Supporting Market Access to Reinvigorate Trade Act of 2022 or the SMART Act
This bill increases through FY2029 funding to carry out the Market Access Program and the Foreign Market Development Cooperator Program, which are programs administered by the Department of Agriculture to promote exports of U.S. agricultural products.
